Posts.Content: God is great and he is going to get us through this Eleanor. You were so brave just to let them shave your head. It couldn't have been easy seeing it come out clump by clump. Tomorrow is another day and you have taken one more big step in this journey that no one wants to be on. I'm thinking of you and praying for you. How are the other side effects going? When is your second treatment? Hugs Pat
Posts.Title: Shaved it!

Posts.Content: How did it go going out yesterday for the first time with your wig? How did things go with the surgeon? Hopefully it will get easier. Hugs and prayers. Pat
Posts.Title: Shaved it!

Posts.Content: Im glad it went ok for you. How's did today go. Hopefully each day will get easier. Are the headaches getting better from the wig?
Posts.Title: Shaved it!
